decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (B3886-22, dated Jun 14, received 07/10/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side wall of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of an infill first floor rear extension to the flat
